summary.span: 表示 控件中的一个项。

span.span: Represents an item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该 控件类似于，其中 显示项列表。The control is similar to a in that it displays a list of items. 主要区别在于， 控件提供了许多不同的方式，用户可以查看项目。The main difference is that the control provides a number of different ways items can be viewed by the user. 类定义与控件中显示的项相关联的外观、行为和数据 。The class defines the appearance, behavior, and data associated with an item that is displayed in the control. 对象可 在控件中显示为四个不同视图之一。 objects can be displayed in the control in one of four different views. 项目可显示为大图标或小图标，或显示为垂直列表中的小图标。Items can be displayed as large or small icons or as small icons in a vertical list. 项还可以具有包含与父项相关的信息的子项。Items can also have subitems that contain information that is related to the parent item. 使用第四个视图样式的 "详细信息" 视图，可以在具有列标题的网格中显示项及其子项，可用于标识子项中显示的信息。The fourth view style, details view, allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that can be used to identify the information being displayed in a subitem. 类的大部分属性提供了 更改与项关联的控件中项的显示方式的方法 。Most of the properties of the class provide ways to change the display of the item in the control it is associated with. 、 和 属性允许您更改项的文本在控件中的显示方式 。The , , and properties allow you to change how the text of the item is displayed in the control. 属性允许您 通过设置 ) 的或 属性 来指定要从分配给 (控件的中加载的图像。The property allows you to specify the image to load from the that is assigned to the control (by setting the or properties of the ). 项可以显示复选框，以便以类似于控件的方式从用户处获取项选择 。Items can display check boxes in order to obtain item choices from the user in a way similar to a control. 您可以使用 属性来确定项是否已选中，或在运行时选中或清除复选框。You can use the property to determine if an item is checked, or to select or clear the check box at run time. 当 关联控件的属性 设置为 ，并且在控件的中定义了列时，项 可以显示任意数量的子项 。Items can display any number of subitems when the property of the associated control is set to and columns are defined in the of the control. 可以通过调用类的方法将子项添加到项 。You can add subitems to an item by calling the method of the class. 属性允许你获取对 类及其成员的访问权限。The property allows you to gain access to the class and its members. 类的某些属性和方法 是控件中属性和方法的特定于项的版本 。Some of the properties and methods of the class are item-specific versions of properties and methods in the control. 例如， 方法类似于 方法的版本，但 版本只影响当前项。For example, the method is similar to the version of the method, but the version affects only the current item. 类还提供了不是方法版本的方法 。The class also provides methods that are not versions of methods. 此 方法将项的文本置于编辑模式，以便在 将控件的属性设置为) 时，用户可以更改该项的文本 (`true` 。The method places the item's text into edit mode so the user can change the item's text (when the property of the control is set to `true`). 使用 方法可以创建现有对象的副本 ，以便在其他控件中重复使用 。The method allows you to create copies of existing objects to reuse in other controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 需要将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在示例中创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性更改项文本后面显示的颜色。You can use the property to change the color displayed behind the item text. 如果要使用不同的背景色和前景色组合 (使用 属性设置前景色) 以便区分一项，则可使用此属性。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the foreground color) to differentiate one item from another. 例如，可以将 属性设置为， 以标识验证失败或缺少子项信息的项。For example, you could set the property to to identify items that have failed validation or are missing subitem information. 如果要为项的所有子项使用相同的背景色，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。If you want to use the same background color for all subitems of an item, set the property to `true`. 这将导致为项指定的颜色和字体用于所有子项文本。This will cause the colors and fonts specified for the item to be used for all subitem text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 包含项的控件的属性设置为时，此属性才有效 `true` 。This property is effective only if the property of the control that contains the item is set to `true`. 您可以在运行时使用此方法，以强制在编辑模式下显示该项的文本。You can use this method at run time to force the item's text to display in edit mode. 例如，如果您要验证用户编辑的项文本，而某个项未能通过验证，则可以选择控件中的项， 然后调用 方法来强制用户更改未通过验证的文本。For example, if you are validating the item text edited by the user, and an item fails validation, you could select the item in the control and call the method to force the user to change the text that failed validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来获取整个项的边框。You can use this method to obtain the bounding rectangle of an entire item. 如果要获取整个项部分的边框，请使用 方法。If you want to obtain the bounding rectangle for a portion of the entire item, use the method. 类提供一个 方法，该方法允许你获取位于控件内的任何项的边框。The class provides a method that allows you to get the bounding rectangle of any item located within the control. 返回的边框使用客户端控件坐标，它们相对于包含的当前可见区域的左上角 。The returned bounding rectangle uses client control coordinates that are relative to the top-left corner of the currently visible area of the containing . 如果 是可滚动和定位以便 不可见，则返回的坐标可能为负数。If the is scrollable and positioned so that the is not visible, the coordinates returned may be negative. 当属性的值为时 ，边框的宽度是包含项的列的宽度，而不是项中文本的宽度。When the property has a value of , the width of the bounding rectangle is the width of the column containing the item, not the width of the text in the item. 如果 集合不包含任何列，则使用默认列宽60像素。If the collection does not contain any columns, the default column width of 60 pixels is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 控件没有直接可编辑的区域，因此只能编辑中包含的项 -当有焦点时，中的项的文本 将显示焦点 reticle 。Because a control does not have directly editable areas - only items contained in the can be edited - the text of an item in the will display the focus reticle when the has focus. 通常，控件中最后一个选定的项 是具有焦点的项。Typically, the last selected item in the control is the item with focus. 尽管项可能会显示焦点 reticle，但它实际上可能并不是中的选定项 。Although an item may display the focus reticle, it might not actually be a selected item in the . 您可以使用 属性来确定该项当前是否为包含它的控件中的焦点项 。You can use the property to determine if the item is currently the focused item in the control that contains it. 如果与 控件不关联，则 此属性将返回 `false` 。If the is not associated with a control, this property will return `false`. 控件提供了 属性，使您可以确定中的哪个 具有焦点。The control provides the property to allow you to determine which in the has the focus.

summary.span: 获取或设置该项所分配到的组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group to which the item is assigned.

value.span: 该项所分配到的 。

span.span: The to which the item is assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可设置项所属的组。Use this property to set the group to which an item belongs. 你还可以在构造函数中设置组 ，或者可以使用此属性在运行时修改组成员身份。You can also set the group in the constructor, or you can use this property to modify the group membership at run time. 如果将此属性设置为， `null` 并且集合中有组 ，则该项将出现在默认组中，其标头标签为 "DefaultGroupSystem"。If you set this property to `null` and there are groups in the collection, the item will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroupSystem.Windows.Forms". 默认组不包含在 集合中，因此无法更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它主要用于调试，以确保所有项都已正确添加到组中。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. > [!NOTE] > 组仅适用于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 家族 ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]) 。 groups are only available on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]). 有关更多信息，请参见 概述主题。For more information, see the overview topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在应用程序中使用属性，该应用程序 按详细信息视图中的子项值组织项。The following code example demonstrates how the property can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式的分组类似于 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在此示例中，将动态创建组。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列，将为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 对于 "父项" 列，将为每个唯一的初始字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 为每个列创建的组与子项文本或首字母一起存储在哈希表中。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 单击列标题时，将检索与该列对应的哈希表。When a column header is clicked, the hash table corresponding to that column is retrieved. 接下来，该列的子项文本值用作哈希表键，以便为每个项检索正确的组。Next, the subitem text values for that column are used as hash table keys to retrieve the correct group for each item. 然后，使用属性将该项分配给组 。The item is then assigned to the group using the property. 此代码示例是为属性提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为该项显示的图像的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the image that is displayed for the item.

value.span: 中为该项显示的图像的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the image in the that is displayed for the item.

value.span: 默认值为 -1。

span.span: The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值取决于属性的值 。The value of this property depends on the value of the property. 根据 与项关联的控件的属性的当前值 ， 该项使用的可能是在属性中指定的值，也可以是 控件的 属性 。Depending on the current value of the property of the control associated with the item, the used by the item could be one specified in the property or the property of the control. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则 使用属性中指定的 ; 否则，将 使用属性中指定的 。If the property is set to , the specified in the property is used; otherwise, the specified in the property is used. 在属性中指定的中定义的映像 应与属性中指定的图像具有相同的索引位置 。The images defined in the specified in the property should have the same index positions as the images in the specified in the property. 如果两个控件的索引位置相同 ，则可以为属性设置单个索引值， 并显示相应的图像，而不考虑控件的属性的值 。If the index positions are the same for both controls, you can set a single index value for the property and the appropriate image will be displayed regardless of the value of the property of the control. 和 是互斥的，也就是说，如果设置了一个，则将另一个设置为无效值并将其忽略。 and are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 如果设置了 属性，则 属性会自动设置为-1。If you set the property, the property is automatically set to -1. 或者，如果设置了 属性，则会 自动将设置为空字符串 ( "" ) 。Alternatively, if you set the property, the is automatically set to an empty string (""). 如果 属性值更改为 `null` ，则 属性返回其默认值-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 但是，分配的 值在内部保留，并在另一个 对象分配给属性时使用 。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another object is assigned to the property. 如果分配给 该属性的新的 属性值小于或等于赋给属性的值 减一 (以将集合作为从零开始的索引) ，则该 属性值将调整为小于 属性值的值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，请考虑一个按钮控件，其 包含三个图像，其 属性设置为2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果为该 按钮分配了只包含两个图像的新，则 该值将更改为1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1.

span.span: is less than -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 中包含项的控件的属性设置为 `true` ，则设置此属性的值将添加或移除选定项集中的项。If the property of the control the item is contained in is set to `true`, setting the value of this property adds or removes the item from the set of selected items. 如果将 属性设置为 `false` ，则将此属性的值设置为选择项会自动取消对控件中的任何其他项的选择 。If the property is set to `false`, setting the value of this property to select an item automatically cancels the selection for any other items in the control. 您可以使用此属性来确定是否选择了某个项或在运行时选择项。You can use this property to determine if an item is selected or to select an item at run time. 您可以使用属性访问在控件中选择的所有项 。You can access all items that are selected in a control by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 仅当控件有焦点时，才会显示项 。Items appear selected only when the control has focus. 若要选择项以响应用户操作（如按钮单击），请确保 除了设置此属性外，还应调用方法。To select items in response to a user action such as a button click, be sure to call the method in addition to setting this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 成员。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and members. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码放在一个包含名为的和名为的窗体底部的窗体中 `ListView1` `Button1` 。To run the example, place the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a , located toward the bottom of the form, named `Button1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. summary.span: 获取或设置为该项显示的状态图像（指示项的状态的图像，例如，选中的复选框或已清除的复选框）的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the state image (an image such as a selected or cleared check box that indicates the state of the item) that is displayed for the item.

value.span: 中为该项显示的状态图像的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the state image in the that is displayed for the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许您指定 分配给关联控件的属性的索引 ，其中存储要显示在该项左侧的状态图像。This property allows you to specify the index into the assigned to the property of the associated control, where the state images to display to the left of the item are stored. 通常，状态图像为选中或已清除的复选框或用于表示项的选中状态或已清除状态的图像。Typically, the state image is a selected or cleared check box or an image that is intended to represent selected or cleared states for the item. 如果没有为属性指定值 ，则 当 控件的属性设置为时，控件将显示默认选中或清除的复选框 `true` 。If no value is specified for the property, the control displays a default selected or cleared check box when the property of the control is set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 尽管 属性中指定的 可以包含任意数量的图像，并且 属性可以设置为等于或小于14的任何值，但只有索引位置0和1之间的图像会显示为状态图像。Although the specified in the property can contain any number of images, and the property can be set to any value equal to or lower than 14, only the images at index positions 0 and 1 are displayed as state images.

exception.span: 为该属性指定的值小于 -1。

span.span: The value specified for this property is less than -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ，你可以添加子项、删除子项和获取子项的计数。Using the , you can add subitems, remove subitems, and obtain a count of subitems. 有关可通过集合中的子项执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅 类参考主题。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the subitems in the collection, see the class reference topics. > [!NOTE] > 中的第一个子项 始终是拥有子项的项。The first subitem in the is always the item that owns the subitems. 对集合中的子项执行操作时，请确保引用索引位置1而不是0来更改第一个子项。When performing operations on subitems in the collection, be sure to reference index position 1 instead of 0 to make changes to the first subitem. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 需要将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在示例中创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你不希望为控件中的所有项和子项使用统一的背景色、前景色和字体 ，可将此属性设置为 `false` 。If you do not want to have a uniform background color, foreground color, and font used for all items and subitems in your control, you can set this property to `false`. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则将忽略对子项的、和属性所做的任何更改 ，而是改用该项的值。When this property is set to `true`, any changes made to the subitem's , , and properties are ignored, and the values of the item are used instead. 如果需要指定要用于子项的其他文本颜色、背景色或字体，以便在控件中显示子项时突出显示项，则可以使用此属性 。You can use this property if you need to specify a different text color, background color, or font to be used for a subitem to highlight the item when subitems are displayed in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置 为以 `false` 定义对象的自定义样式 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to `false` to define a custom style for objects. 该示例还演示如何设置 和 属性。The example also demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializeListView` 在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法中调用方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form and call the `InitializeListView` method in form's constructor or event-handling method.
